Bakersfield.Gosford, California:
Gosford is an unincorporated community in Kern County, California. It is located on the Southern Pacific Railroad 7 miles (11 km) southwest of Bakersfield, at an elevation of 364 feet (111 m).
Gosford was founded by the Southern Pacific Railroad in 1893 and named in honor of the Earl of Gosford, a former landowner.
